description: Expansion of (1 - 2*x -x^4) / (1 - 2*x)^2 in powers of x.
formula: a(n) = 2^n for all n<4. - _Michael Somos_, Aug 19 2014a(n) = 4*(a(n-1) - a(n-2)) for all n in Z except n=4. - _Michael Somos_, Aug 19 2014a(n) = 2*a(n-1) - 2^(n-4) = 2^n - (n-3) * 2^(n-4) for all n>=4. - _Michael Somos_, Aug 19 20140 = a(n)*(-8*a(n+1) + 8*a(n+2) - 2*a(n+3)) + a(n+1)*(+4*a(n+1) - 4*a(n+2) + a(n+3)) for all n in Z. - _Michael Somos_, Aug 19 2014
maple: A008936 := proc(n) option remember; if n <= 3 then 2^n else 2*A008936(n-1)-2^(n-4); fi; end;
mathematica: a[ n_] := 2^n - 2^(n-4) Max[0, n-3]; (* _Michael Somos_, Aug 19 2014 *)
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = 2^n - 2^(n-4) * max(n-3, 0)}; /* _Michael Somos_, 12 Jan 2000 */(PARI) Vec((1-2*x-x^4)/(1-2*x)+O(x^99)) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 26 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Alejandro Teruel (teruel(AT)usb.ve)
